data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Colombo. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Colombo, Sri Lanka
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Colombo, Sri Lanka to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 11784 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Colombo, Sri Lanka by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Colombo, Sri Lanka.
Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Parsee people might believe through him.
Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Colombo, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Colombo, Sri Lanka.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Colombo, Sri Lanka a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
